I make cool things

Hi! I'm currently studying Mechanical Engineering at UMD. Previously at Protocad, a rapid prototyping and design firm, and FIRST Robotics alum. I'm interested in human-centric industrial product design, and dabble in 3d-fabricated design and electronics. I also do design and programming- check those out on my home page.
